label: Bug-2
title: Fix incorrect API URL path in graph-service.js
description:
The graph-service.js is using an incorrect API base URL.

## Current Behavior
API calls are being made to:
- `http://0.0.0.0:10041/api/nodes`

## Expected Behavior
API calls should be made to:
- `http://0.0.0.0:10041/nodes/api/nodes`

## Root Cause
The `API_BASE` constant in `graph-service.js` is set to `/api` but the actual FastAPI routes are mounted under `/nodes/api`.

## Fix Required
Change `const API_BASE = '/api';` to `const API_BASE = '/nodes/api';` in:
- `v0.1.7/js/graph-service.js`

Or create a surgical fix in v0.1.8 that overrides the API_BASE.
